item.title: Command Only Working at random times

item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("sgt yoshi")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; sendMessage("You have been made Moderator by "+playerName+"."); c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); sendMessage("Don't abuse your powers!"); server.playerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(4); sendMessage("You just made "+command.substring(4)+" a moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Anything wrong with it? Everytime I do it, it says they are either offline, or donâ€™t exist. But the person is always online.
